title: Emerald Diamond Grandeur: Contemporary Haaram with Traditional Roots
materials: Deep Green). Hyderabadi Polish for a lasting luster.
features: This Haaram features a contemporary design with a tiered chevron pattern adorned with pavé-set diamonds. The central pendant showcases intricate filigree work and a striking oval-cut emerald. The pendant is further enhanced with cascading diamond-studded elements and delicate gold bead accents, blending modern aesthetics with traditional South Indian grandeur.
colors: Primarily a luminous combination of yellow gold and brilliant white diamonds
accented by the rich green of the emeralds.
occasions: and contemporary Indian weddings. Its elegant design also makes it suitable for formal gatherings and special occasions.
description: This statement piece seamlessly blends contemporary design with traditional South Indian artistry. The high-quality diamonds and emeralds create a dazzling display of light. The Hyderabadi polish ensures long-lasting shine and the unique design is sure to make you stand out. A true investment piece that can be treasured for generations.
